translation.en: In Loving Memory of KIM JONG-IL
[anchorman] Tensions are rising as the stand-off
between the world community and the rogue North African nation of Wadiya
translation.zh: 与北非瓦迪亚间的对峙恶化

translation.en: intensified today
translation.zh: 与北非瓦迪亚间的对峙恶化 紧张局势加剧

translation.en: as U.N. weapons inspectors were once again refused access to the country
translation.zh: 联合国武器核查团再次被

translation.en: by Wadiyan leader, Admiral General Aladeen.
translation.zh: 瓦迪亚领导人阿拉甸上将拒绝入境

translation.en: I will take no options off the table. And I mean what I say.
translation.zh:
我不放弃使用任何手段
这不是说说而已

translation.en: [anchorman] Tonight we ask... Who is General Aladeen?
translation.zh:
今晚 我们来看看…
阿拉甸将军是何许人

translation.en: According to Wadiyan propaganda,
Haffaz Aladeen was born in 1973.
translation.zh: 阿法兹·阿拉甸于1973年出生

translation.en: He did not know his mother, who died in childbirth.
translation.zh: 他没见过死于分娩的母亲

translation.en: The only son of the savage dictator Omar Aladeen,
translation.zh: 这位野蛮独裁者 奥马尔·阿拉甸的独子

translation.en: he gained power at the age of 7.
Eccentric and with unlimited oil wealth,
translation.zh: 他异乎常人且拥有无尽的石油财富

translation.en: he recently hosted his own Olympic Games...
translation.zh: 最近举办了自己的奥运会

translation.en: [Olympic official on speaker] On your mark, get set.
[anchorman] ...at which he won 14 gold medals.
[spectators chanting] Aladeen! Aladeen!
translation.zh: 新的世界纪录 阿拉甸！阿拉甸！

translation.en: [anchorman] Often described as ignorant,
he changed over 300 Wadiyan words to "Aladeen,"
translation.zh: 他把逾300个瓦迪亚语单词改为"阿拉甸"

translation.en: including the words "positive" and "negative," causing mass confusion.
translation.zh:
包括"正面"及"负面"这两个词
引起大量混乱

translation.en: Do you want the Aladeen news or the Aladeen news?
translation.zh: 你想要"阿拉甸"消息还是"阿拉甸"消息？

translation.en: The Aladeen news?
You are HIV-Aladeen.
translation.zh:
你是艾滋病病毒
"阿拉甸"

translation.en: [anchorman] With pressure mounting,
translation.zh: 各方压力日增的情况下

translation.en: Aladeen addressed his nation today.
translation.zh: 阿拉甸今日发表全国讲话

translation.en: [crowd chanting] Aladeen! Aladeen!
People of Wadiya,
I come before you today
translation.zh: 今天 我来到你们面前

translation.en: to tell you that the world shall kneel before our great nation.
translation.zh: 告诉你们 世界将向我们伟大的祖国屈身敬拜

translation.en: We are two months away from enriching weapons-grade uranium
translation.zh: 我们还差两个月就能制备出武器级浓缩铀

translation.en: to be used for peaceful purposes. [snickering]
It will be used only for medical research
and clean energy. It will, it will.
translation.zh: 与清洁能源 这是真的

translation.en: And will certainly never be used
to attack Is... Oh, boy.
[anchorman] With that speech, today,
translation.zh: 独裁者 今日演讲后

translation.en: the international community is asking one question:
Does the Mad Dog of Wadiya have nuclear weapons?
translation.zh: 这位瓦迪亚狂人是否拥有核武器

translation.en: Now, show me my nuclear weapons!
I can't wait! I can't wait! [laughing]
This is the Beard of Doom rocket?
This is my weapon? I will be a laughing stock!
translation.zh:
这就是我的武器？
我会成为笑柄的！

translation.en: All my friends have got nuclear weapons.
translation.zh: 我的朋友都有核武器了

translation.en: Even Ahmadinejad!
And he looks like a snitch on Miami Vice.
translation.zh: 他看上去就像《迈阿密风云》里告密的货色

translation.en: Where is the Head of my Nuclear Program and Procurer of Women?
translation.zh: 我核武器项目及拉皮条的负责人呢？

translation.en: Where is Nuclear Nadal?
You had Nadal executed, Supreme Leader.
translation.zh: 您把纳达尔处决了啊 元首

translation.en: Why did I do that?
Ah! Supreme Leader!
Ah, Nadal.
We are just months away from refining weapons-grade uranium,
translation.zh: 再有几个月我们就能提炼出军用铀了

translation.en: and we are set to test the missile next week.
It is too round on the top. It needs to be pointy.
translation.zh: 这顶上太圆了 得改成尖的

translation.en: Round is not scary. Pointy is scary.
translation.zh: 圆头没威慑力 尖头有威慑力

translation.en: This will put a smile on the faces of the enemy.
translation.zh: 这个会让敌人露出笑容

translation.en: They will think that it is a huge robot dildo flying toward them.
translation.zh: 他们会以为是个机械假阳具朝他们飞来

translation.en: No, Supreme Leader.
The shape of the missile top has nothing to do with aerodynamics.
translation.zh: 弹头的形状不是为了减少空气阻力

translation.en: It is about the payload delivery.
translation.zh: 是出于有效负荷运载考虑

translation.en: No. It sticks in the ground, and then kaboom.
translation.zh: 不 核弹就是栽进地里然后爆炸

translation.en: Supreme Leader, I think perhaps
translation.zh: 大人 恐怕你对炸弹的认识

translation.en: some of your information about bombs is coming from cartoons.
Nonsense. I have been watching research films.
translation.zh: 瞎说 我看的是研究资料片

translation.en: In this film, just one question,
was there a duck who, when the explosion is happens,
translation.zh: 是否有只鸭子 在爆炸发生时

translation.en: his bill goes around to the back of his head,
and then in order to talk, he has to put it back this way?
translation.zh: 为了要说话 还得把嘴拽回原位

translation.en: There was somebody who suffered a deformity like that.
translation.zh: 是有个角色发生了这种畸形变化

translation.en: Okay.
I am now 100% sure that you are watching cartoons.
translation.zh: 我百分百肯定你看的是动画片

translation.en: Indulge me. For one second, pretend that I'm an idiot.
translation.zh: 就当我是个蠢货 让我再执迷不悟一会

translation.en: Okay. I'm there.
Okay. You know what?
Let's just agree to disagree, my friend.
translation.zh: 让我们求同存异 我的朋友

translation.en: Okay.
What? Why? No!
translation.zh: 怎么回事？为什么？不要啊！

translation.en: -[head scientist] Don't you remember? -Of course I remember!
How dare you question my memory? I remember everything!
translation.zh: 你竟敢质疑我的记忆力？我从来不忘事！

translation.en: No, I would never do that! Never! I'm so sorry. I didn't mean that.
translation.zh:
不不 我怎么会质疑！
非常抱歉 我不是那个意思

translation.en: Don't worry, it's fine. Well done, my friend.
translation.zh: 别担心 没关系的 你做得很好

translation.en: Thank you.
Wait! Wait! Where are we going?
Admiral General, what if we just tell the United Nations
translation.zh: 元首 不如我们跟联合国说

translation.en: we have no nuclear weapons?
They will lift the sanctions.
We'll be free to sell oil rights to the Jalabiya desert.
translation.zh: 我们就可以出售沙漠采油权

translation.en: Uncle Tamir.
Do you not remember what my saintly father
translation.zh: 你不记得我伟大的父亲

translation.en: made me promise him on his deathbed?
translation.zh: 临死前让我保证什么了吗？

translation.en: It was never to sell Wadiya's oil.
translation.zh: 就是绝不出售瓦迪亚的采油权

translation.en: You remember that was when he gave me power
translation.zh: 记得不 就是那时候他传位于我

translation.en: instead of you, the rightful heir.
translation.zh: 而不是你这个合法继位人

translation.en: You've been so cool about it.
Now, let's go back to the palace.
It's the season finale of Real Housewives of Shachahmahahfalimitahlicch!
translation.zh: 今天是沙哈娇妻 真人秀季终集

translation.en: Death to the tyrant!
Looks like we need to find a new double.
translation.zh: 看来我们得找个新替身了

translation.en: Because this one is...
You know, I don't know if he's going to get better.
translation.zh: 我不知道他会不会好转

translation.en: Oh, he's not going to recover, sir. He's dead.
translation.zh: 他不会恢复知觉的 他已经死了

translation.en: Yeah, how 'bout looking in my eye when I'm speaking to you?
translation.zh: 我跟你说话的时候你得看着我的眼睛

translation.en: It's very rude not to look at somebody in the eye when they're talking to you.
translation.zh:
人家跟你说话时 你不看着人家
是很不礼貌的

translation.en: It's okay. Don't worry. You're having a rough day.
translation.zh: 没关系 别担心 你今天受累了

translation.en: We shot the wrong man.
I can fix this. I have a new plan. We need to find a new double.
translation.zh:
我可以弥补的 我另有一计
我们得找个新替身

translation.en: One that is simple enough to be manipulated completely.
I think we found what you are looking for.
You think this man looks like me?
You have a very big barn.
You must have many happy goats, hmm?
What the fuck does that even mean?
Uncle Tamir, this thing is an idiot.
translation.zh: 塔米尔叔叔 这家伙是个白痴

translation.en: What makes you think he can do the job?
translation.zh: 你怎么会觉得他能胜任这工作？

translation.en: May I remind you that his only real job is to be shot in the head.
translation.zh:
容我提醒 他唯一的职责
就是脑袋被人枪打

translation.en: Very well. Put him through the process, okay?
translation.zh: 很好 给他做做上岗准备 好吗？

translation.en: Clip his nails, file his teeth,
translation.zh: 把他指甲剪短 牙齿锉好

translation.en: bleach his skin, and shorten the penis.
translation.zh: 皮肤漂白 阴茎弄短

translation.en: [Aladeen] Megan! Megan!
You now have herpes.
Megan, you were worth every penny.
translation.zh: 梅根 你真是物有所值啊

translation.en: Mmm. You were super hot.
Is my jet ready?
Yes, but do you want to stay the night?
translation.zh: 准备好了 但是你想留下过夜吗？

translation.en: You know, I really want to do some cuddling.
No. Your time is up.
I have to be with the Italian Prime Minister tomorrow.

translation.en: Okay. Maroush, give the goodie bag!
translation.zh: 好吧 马鲁什 把酬金袋子给她！

translation.en: [softly] Thanks.
[Aladeen] I trust everything is in there,
as your manager requested?
Katy Perry said she got a diamond Rolex.

translation.en: That's because she let me Aladeen in her face.
translation.zh: 那是因为她让我颜射了

translation.en: [grunts] Okay.
Right. Are you sure you don't want to stay for some cuddles?

translation.en: -No. -[Aladeen] But, please.
I really want someone to cuddle.

translation.en: [anchorman] Breaking news now. Just moments ago,

translation.en: the U.N. Security Council voted

translation.en: to authorize NATO air strikes against Wadiya,

translation.en: unless Admiral General Aladeen agrees to address the U.N. in person.

除非阿拉甸上将同意
亲自向联合国作讲话

translation.en: And now, the world waits.
translation.zh: 现在 全世界拭目以待

translation.en: What will Aladeen do next?

translation.en: [automated voice] You've unlocked the suicide vest!
translation.zh: 你获得了自杀袭击背心

translation.en: [Aladeen] Next. No, no, no. No. Boring, boring. Come on. Come on.
translation.zh: 下一关选…不要这个…不要…这个好 大人 我刚收到坏消息

translation.en: Beloved Oppressor, I have just received disturbing news.
translation.zh: 大人 我刚收到坏消息

translation.en: [automated voice] Welcome to the Munich Olympics.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到慕尼黑奥运会

translation.en: Shalom?
Oy vey!
Supreme Leader,
the United Nations demands that
you address their concerns about our nuclear program,
or they will vote to authorize military action.
translation.zh: 否则他们就投票批准军事行动

translation.en: Very well.
Then I shall address this gathering of snakes they call the U.N.
translation.zh: 好 我就拜会这群 联合国的狗逼

translation.en: We are going to the devil's nest
of America!
Ah, America!
Built by the blacks and owned by the Chinese.

translation.en: Supreme Leader, I took the liberty of hiring some extra security.

translation.en: This is Mr. Clayton.
Admiral General, I am here for your protection 24/7.

translation.en: Okay.
But in the interest of full disclosure, I have to say I hate A-rabs.

但为了信息充分披露 我必须告诉你

translation.en: Well, that's fine, because I'm not an Arab.
translation.zh: 没问题 我不是阿拉伯人

translation.en: Well, you're all A-rabs to me, the blacks, the Jews,

对我而言 你们都是阿拉伯人
黑人 犹太人

translation.en: those blue tree-hugging queers in A-vatar.

实际上 所有非美国本土的人
理论上讲都是阿拉伯人

translation.en: Listen, while you're here, I highly recommend a visit to the Empire State Building,
translation.zh: 您在这儿的时候 我强烈推荐到帝国大厦一游

translation.en: before you or one of your sand-monkey cousins takes it down.
translation.zh: 赶在你或者你的沙猴亲戚炸了它之前

translation.en: Supreme Leader, the suite has been renovated to your specifications.

translation.en: Twenty dollars a day for Internet? What the fuck?

translation.en: And they accuse me of being an international criminal?

translation.en: Beloved Oppressor, try to get some sleep.

translation.en: Tomorrow is your big speech.

translation.en: Nobody touch the minibar! It's a fucking rip-off!

translation.en: [Clayton] Rise and shine.
[Aladeen] Who are you?
We've actually already met.

translation.en: Hello, Aladdin.
-Clayton? -Here's the deal.

translation.en: Are you serious?
Where'd you get those relics?

Yeah, right.
I mean, I know there's nothing more annoying

translation.en: than a backseat torturer, but, please, come on.
This is great stuff.

translation.en: You won't be talking so much smack with this up your butt.

translation.en: That's the Anal Umbrella. It's a good device, I grant you,

translation.en: but where's the splash guard?
You're going to kill me and your white shirt.

translation.en: It didn't come with a splash guard.
You're gonna get chara on your trousers.
I can see it has a screw hole for one.

translation.en: Apparently, I didn't get it.
All right, Mr. Smart Guy,
check out this bad boy.
Oh, that's not bad. The Kandahar Cock Wrench.

translation.en: Okay, so, now we're getting somewhere.

translation.en: You know, [sighs] this is totally depressing.
Listen, just show me another one.
You know, honestly, I don't even want to show you anything anymore.

translation.en: Don't be like that.
You know, I don't even think you want to be tortured.
translation.zh: 我觉得你都没想给我折磨

translation.en: I don't want to be tortured.
You're just, like, taking all the fun out of it!
translation.zh: 被你搞得一点乐趣也没！

translation.en: What else you got? I'm gonna love the next thing!

translation.en: I will be supportive.
All right.
Just this. This pours hot fire out on you.
Oh, the Fallujah Firehose!
Someone's got a friend in Syria!

translation.en: I am pretty proud of it.

translation.en: There is a new model, you know.
I've got one that works by Bluetooth.
Screw it. Screw it! Screw it!
I'm going to enjoy this now.
No, don't. Don't. Don't. Please, don't!
No one will recognize the body without this!

translation.en: The Supreme Beard! You will be cursed!

最高胡子!
你会遭天谴的！

translation.en: [screams] No, no, don't do it!
Come one! Why won't this catch?

translation.en: You foolish man! There is no earthly fire that could ever light...

translation.en: The flames of the righteous attack the unjust!
translation.zh: 正义的火焰打倒无义之人

translation.en: I'll be back with help! J.K.! Just kidding!

translation.en: My speech.
Yo! Average American shopper!
Give me your clothes!
Hello. I am Admiral General Aladeen. I am here to deliver my speech to the United Nations.

我是阿拉甸上将
我是来向联合国发言的

translation.en: Look, Admiral, it's too hot for crazy.

translation.en: How dare you?
Listen, Tamir is coming right now. [sirens wailing]

translation.en: You're going to be in big trouble. Here he is.

translation.en: Tamir! Tamir!
Tamir, it was you, you snake!

translation.en: He's not the legitimate leader! He's not the legitimate leader!
[Tamir] You have rehearsed the speech I prepared for you?

translation.en: He's feeling ill.
Does he have worms in his shilshul?

translation.en: Very possibly.
Admiral General Aladeen preparing
to address the General Assembly of the United Nations.
An historic moment.
He's approaching the podium.
And he's walked right past the podium.
What is he doing?
You are making a fool out of me!
Let's bring in Denise, our U.N. correspondent. What do you make of that?

translation.en: Well, I have to say, he's got their attention.

translation.en: Every eye in the room is on him right now.

translation.en: And he's returning to the podium.
And he's fallen off the stage.
What do you make of that, Denise?
You know, he's clearly implying that the U.N. must fall before him.

translation.en: Drinking from the pitcher of water directly,
as opposed to the glass that I'm sure must be up there.
translation.zh: 而不是用杯子 讲台上应该放着的

translation.en: What do you think that means?
Again, it's another attempt to say,
translation.zh: 他又是在传递一个信息

translation.en: "Listen, I'm not going to play by your rules."
And he seems to have a pitcher of urine out.
I believe he just urinated in the pitcher.

translation.en: He is now drinking his urine.
It looks to be his own urine.
Sorry. You want?

translation.en: Trying to force it on the Israeli delegation.

translation.en: That might be the ambassador.
He is dumping the urine on the Israeli delegation.

translation.en: Oh, that's a good one.
Okay, he's returning to the podium.
Much has been made of the hostility between our countries.

translation.en: With the help of the U.M.,
I will draft a new constitution for Wadiya

translation.en: and sign it in five days, on Wadiya's Independence Day.

translation.en: No, no, no.
[Efawadh on screen] This new constitution
will end the dictatorship...
No!
...and it will turn Wadiya into a...
democracy.
No! Democracy? Never!
Never!
The Wadiyan people love being oppressed!
translation.zh: 瓦迪亚人民喜欢被压迫！

translation.en: Dictatorship forever!
Come on! Come with me!
Hurry!
Hello, person. Person.
Black person.
